title: French Wedding Venue Extraction Schema
description: The definitive JSON Schema for extracting structured data from French wedding venue content. All fields are optional and nullable. Only extract information explicitly stated in the source text — never guess or infer. Return null for any field where the information is not present.

overview.description: Top-level numeric summary fields for filtering and sorting. These are the high-level numbers a couple searches by. Extract the single best number for each — do not put ranges here.

min_price_eur.description: The lowest advertised starting price for wedding venue hire in EUR. If the venue quotes seasonal pricing, use the cheapest season. Exclude per-person catering costs — this is venue hire only unless the venue only offers all-inclusive packages.

max_guests.description: The maximum total number of wedding guests the venue can accommodate for a seated dinner. If only a general 'up to X guests' is stated without specifying seated vs standing, use that number.

min_guests.description: The minimum number of guests required for a standard wedding booking. E.g. some venues require a minimum of 50 or 80 guests. Only extract if explicitly stated.

max_sleeping_guests.description: The maximum number of guests who can sleep on-site across all accommodation (chateau rooms, gites, cottages, dormitories). Do NOT include nearby off-site hotels.

total_bedrooms.description: Total number of bedrooms across all on-site accommodation buildings. Mirrors accommodation.total_bedrooms for top-level filtering convenience.

estate_size_hectares.description: Total estate/property size in hectares. Convert from acres if necessary (1 acre = 0.4047 hectares).

identity.description: Core identifying information about the venue — who it is, what it is, and how it presents itself.

venue_name.description: The official name of the venue as it appears on its own website. E.g. 'Chateau de Pondres', 'Domaine de Lamanon'.

venue_type.description: Primary property classification. E.g. 'chateau', 'domaine', 'bastide', 'mas', 'manoir', 'abbaye', 'hotel'. Use lowercase.

venue_subtype.description: More specific architectural or historical sub-classification if stated. E.g. 'cistercian abbey', 'neo-gothic castle', 'baroque bijou', 'boutique hotel', 'chambres d'hotes'.

tagline.description: Short marketing tagline or strapline used by the venue. E.g. 'Un Ecrin d'emotions en Provence'.

short_description.description: A 1-3 sentence marketing summary of the venue as found on the website or listings.

exclusivity_model.description: Whether the venue is rented exclusively (privatised) for the event or shared with other guests/events. 'full_exclusivity' = always privatised, 'optional_exclusivity' = exclusivity available as an upgrade, 'shared' = shared with other guests/events.

owner_names.description: Names of the venue owners or primary operators. E.g. ['Coen Stork', 'Catherine Stork'].

management_company.description: Parent company, management entity, or foundation operating the venue. E.g. 'Domaines & evenements SAS', 'La Napoule Art Foundation'.

network_membership.description: Hotel network or brand collection the venue belongs to. E.g. 'The Originals Hotels', 'Homanie', 'Home Sweet Event'.

media_features.description: Publications, TV shows, or media where the venue has been featured. E.g. ['Conde Nast Brides', 'Vogue', 'Channel 4 Escape to the Chateau DIY', 'Style Me Pretty'].

filming_credits.description: Films or productions shot at the venue. E.g. ['Le Comte de Monte Cristo (2024)'].

certifications.description: Environmental, quality, or safety certifications. E.g. ['Green Key', 'Cle Verte', 'Jardins Remarquables', 'Monument Historique'].

google_rating.description: Google review score (0-5 scale) if explicitly stated.

google_review_count.description: Number of Google reviews if explicitly stated.

languages_spoken.description: Languages the venue staff can communicate in. E.g. ['French', 'English', 'Spanish', 'German'].

location.description: Geographic and address information. Extract exactly as stated — do not geocode or calculate distances yourself.

address.description: Full postal address of the venue.

gps_coordinates.description: GPS coordinates if explicitly stated on the venue website or listing.

sub_region.description: Specific sub-region, terroir, or area. E.g. 'Luberon', 'Alpilles', 'Bordeaux & Gironde', 'Pays Cathar', 'Vexin'.

natural_park.description: Named natural or regional park the venue is within or adjacent to. E.g. 'Alpilles Regional Park', 'Parc Naturel Regional du Luberon'.

nearest_city.description: Closest major city with distance or drive time. E.g. {name: 'Montpellier', distance_text: '35 minutes'}.

nearest_cities.description: Multiple nearby cities with distances if several are mentioned.

nearest_airports.description: Nearest airports with distance/drive time. E.g. [{name: 'Marseille Airport', distance_text: '1 hour'}].

nearest_train_stations.description: Nearest train/TGV stations with distance/drive time.

motorway_access.description: Nearest motorway and exit details. E.g. 'A9, exit no. 34', 'A7 Avignon Nord Exit, 15 min'.

distance_to_paris.description: Travel time/distance from Paris if stated. E.g. '2h40 by TGV', '1 hour by car'.

distance_to_coast.description: Distance to the nearest beach or coastline if stated. E.g. '10 km to Cap d'Agde', '40 minutes to Mediterranean'.

nearby_villages.description: Names of nearby charming or notable villages. E.g. ['Gordes', 'Lourmarin', 'Eygalieres'].

nearby_attractions.description: Notable tourist sites or landmarks nearby. E.g. ['Pont du Gard', 'Monet house in Giverny', 'Cite de Carcassonne'].

landscape_description.description: Prose description of the geographic/landscape setting. E.g. 'between the Mediterranean and the Cevennes'.

shuttle_service_available.description: Whether the venue can arrange shuttle or taxi transfers for guests.

history.description: Historical background of the property — construction, ownership, architecture, heritage status.

construction_period.description: Century or date range of original construction. E.g. '16th century', '1854', '1770-1775'.

construction_year.description: Specific year of construction if known. E.g. 1855.

architect.description: Name of the architect if stated. E.g. 'Joseph Paxton'.

listed_monument_status.description: Official heritage classification if stated. E.g. 'Monument Historique', 'Inscrit aux Monuments Historiques'.

historical_families.description: Notable families historically associated with the property. E.g. ['Rothschild family', 'La Rochefoucauld family', 'Saint-Exupery family'].

historical_narrative.description: Full historical account of the property as described in the source text. Retain key facts, dates, and figures.

notable_architectural_features.description: Specific standout architectural elements. E.g. ['glass ceiling by Joseph Paxton', '4 towers, 12 turrets, 26 spiral staircases', 'Corinthian columns', 'sculpted stone fireplace'].

renovation_history.description: Details about renovation or restoration work. E.g. 'Full renovation 2014-2019 using authentic materials'.

literary_cultural_associations.description: Connections to literature, art, or culture. E.g. ['Marcel Pagnol', 'Moliere performed here'].

spaces.description: Array of named event/reception spaces at the venue. Each space is a distinct area that can be used for ceremonies, cocktails, dinners, or dancing. Include both indoor and outdoor spaces.

accommodation.description: On-site sleeping accommodation details. This covers the chateau rooms, gites, cottages, and any other buildings where guests can stay overnight.

on_site_accommodation.description: Whether overnight accommodation is available on-site.

total_bedrooms.description: Total number of bedrooms across all on-site buildings.

total_sleeping_capacity.description: Maximum number of guests who can sleep on-site.

mandatory_accommodation_purchase.description: Whether guests are required to purchase on-site accommodation as part of the booking. E.g. some venues mandate Saturday night accommodation for all guests.

mandatory_accommodation_details.description: Details about mandatory accommodation rules. E.g. 'Accommodation mandatory on Saturday night for 48 persons', 'All guests must stay on-site'.

bridal_suite.description: Whether a dedicated bridal suite exists.

bridal_suite_description.description: Description of the bridal suite if one exists.

preparation_rooms.description: Details about dedicated getting-ready rooms for bride and/or groom.

buildings.description: Array of separate accommodation buildings on the estate. E.g. the main chateau, individual gites, cottages, annexes.

room_amenities_common.description: Amenities common across most rooms. E.g. ['WiFi', 'air conditioning', 'en-suite bathroom', 'hairdryer', 'towels and linens'].

breakfast_included.description: Whether breakfast is included in the room rate or venue hire.

breakfast_details.description: Description of breakfast service. E.g. 'gourmet breakfast trays served in-room or on terrace'.

breakfast_price_per_person_eur.description: Per-person breakfast cost in EUR when not included in the price. E.g. 17. If multiple tiers exist (standard vs VIP), use the lowest.

dormitory_available.description: Whether a dormitory or shared sleeping space is available.

dormitory_beds.description: Number of beds in the dormitory if one exists.

nearby_accommodation.description: Names or descriptions of nearby off-site accommodation options for overflow guests. E.g. ['IBIS Avignon', 'Paxton Paris Marne-la-Vallee (4-star partner hotel)'].

partner_hotel.description: Named partner hotel for guest overflow if the venue has a formal partnership.

pricing.description: All pricing information. Extract exact figures as stated. Use EUR as currency. Note whether prices include tax (TTC) or exclude it (HT).

pricing_model.description: How the venue structures its pricing: 'dry_hire' = venue rental only, 'all_inclusive' = everything bundled, 'packages' = tiered named packages, 'hybrid' = base hire + optional add-ons.

starting_price_eur.description: Lowest advertised starting price in EUR.

starting_price_description.description: What the starting price includes. E.g. 'venue hire for 2 nights with accommodation for 43 guests'.

prices_include_tax.description: Whether stated prices include VAT/tax (TTC = true, HT = false).

vat_rate_percentage.description: The applicable VAT rate as stated in the brochure. E.g. 20. If different rates apply (10% food, 20% services), use the primary rate and note the split in starting_price_description.

tourist_tax_note.description: Details about tourist tax (taxe de sejour) if mentioned. E.g. '4.88 EUR per person per night, applies from age 18', 'tourist taxes not included'.

pricing_year.description: Which year(s) the pricing applies to. E.g. '2026-2027'.

seasonal_pricing.description: Pricing broken down by season and/or day of week.

catering_cost_per_person_eur.description: Starting per-person catering cost in EUR if quoted separately from venue hire.

children_catering_price_eur.description: Per-child catering cost in EUR if stated. E.g. 25 for ages 3-12.

children_pricing_age_range.description: Age range for children's pricing. E.g. '3-12 years, free under 3'.

drinks_cost_per_person_eur.description: Starting per-person drinks/bar package cost in EUR if quoted separately.

brunch_cost_per_person_eur.description: Per-person brunch cost in EUR if quoted separately. E.g. 39.

brunch_venue_fee_eur.description: Flat venue fee for hosting a brunch event if quoted as a lump sum. E.g. 5200.

welcome_dinner_cost_eur.description: Supplement or fee for a pre-wedding welcome dinner if quoted separately. E.g. 2400.

minimum_nights.description: Minimum number of nights required for a wedding booking.

additional_night_rate_eur.description: Cost per additional night beyond the standard rental period. E.g. 1500, 2200, 5000.

extended_hour_rate_eur.description: Cost per additional hour beyond the standard end time. E.g. 300, 600, 800.

rental_period_description.description: Standard rental period. E.g. 'Friday 2PM to Monday 12PM', 'Saturday to Sunday'.

deposit_percentage.description: Required booking deposit as a percentage of total cost.

deposit_amount_eur.description: Required booking deposit as a fixed EUR amount if not expressed as a percentage.

deposit_refundable.description: Whether the booking deposit is refundable upon cancellation.

security_deposit_eur.description: Refundable damage/security deposit amount in EUR, separate from the booking deposit. E.g. 2500, 10000.

security_deposit_return_days.description: Number of days after the event for security deposit return. E.g. 14, 30.

payment_schedule.description: Multi-stage payment milestones beyond the initial deposit. Extract each stage as stated.

payment_methods.description: Accepted payment methods. E.g. ['bank transfer', 'credit card', 'American Express'].

cancellation_policy.description: Summary of cancellation terms and penalties.

cleaning_fee_eur.description: Post-event cleaning fee in EUR if charged separately. E.g. 150, 300, 2150.

security_guard_cost_eur.description: Cost for mandatory or optional security guard service in EUR. E.g. 350, 800.

coordinator_cost_eur.description: Cost for day-of coordinator or event management service in EUR if charged separately. E.g. 900, 4390.

price_includes.description: List of items included in the base price. E.g. ['exclusive use', 'tables and chairs', 'accommodation for 52', 'swimming pool access'].

price_excludes.description: Items explicitly NOT included in the base price. E.g. ['chateau access', 'pool area', 'catering', 'decoration', 'tourist tax'].

price_extras.description: Services available at additional cost. E.g. ['security guards', 'decoration', 'sound system', 'babysitter'].

catering.description: Food and beverage information — how catering works at this venue.

catering_model.description: How catering is handled: 'in_house_only' = venue's own chef exclusively, 'recommended_list' = must choose from approved caterers, 'free_choice' = couples choose any caterer, 'imposed_caterer' = one specific external caterer is mandatory, 'hybrid' = seasonal or mixed rules.

in_house_chef.description: Name and title of in-house chef if one exists. E.g. 'Patrick Juhel, Meilleur Ouvrier de France 2000'.

recommended_caterers.description: Names of approved/recommended caterers. E.g. ['BRUNET Traiteur', 'FLEUR DE SEL', 'Aynel Traiteur'].

cuisine_style.description: Description of cuisine style. E.g. 'gastronomic French Mediterranean', 'bistronomic', 'seasonal and locally sourced'.

dietary_accommodations.description: Whether dietary requirements (vegetarian, vegan, allergies, religious) are accommodated.

professional_kitchen.description: Whether a professional/commercial kitchen is available for caterers to use.

kitchen_size_sqm.description: Size of the catering kitchen in square metres if stated.

on_site_restaurant.description: Name of on-site restaurant if one exists. E.g. 'Restaurant La Canopee', 'Le Baron'.

brunch_available.description: Whether a day-after brunch option is available.

brunch_description.description: Details about the brunch offering. E.g. 'brunch by the pool', 'choice of homemade, caterer, or food truck'.

late_night_food_available.description: Whether late-night snack service is available after the main dinner. E.g. bacon brioche, charcuterie boards, croque monsieur.

pre_wedding_dinner.description: Whether a welcome/rehearsal dinner option is available the evening before.

tasting_meal_included.description: Whether a pre-event tasting meal is included for the couple.

wedding_cake.description: Whether wedding cake is available (in-house, included in package, or external). E.g. 'included in package', 'can be made on-site', 'external'.

corkage_fee.description: Whether a corkage fee is charged for BYO drinks. false = no corkage.

corkage_fee_amount_eur.description: Corkage fee amount per bottle in EUR if charged. E.g. 5.

byo_wine_allowed.description: Whether couples can bring their own wine/champagne.

mandatory_venue_drinks.description: Whether all drinks must be purchased from the venue (no BYO allowed at all). Common at brewery or vineyard venues.

venue_wine_requirement.description: Any requirement to feature venue wines on the menu. E.g. 'at least one estate wine must be featured', '1 bottle per 2 guests minimum from cellar'.

on_site_wine_production.description: Whether the venue produces its own wine.

wine_appellation.description: Wine appellation/AOC if the venue is a wine estate. E.g. 'AOC Cotes de Provence', 'Gaillac AOC'.

bar_service_description.description: Description of bar/drinks arrangements. E.g. 'open bar included for 3 hours', 'self-service bar in Orangerie', 'bar team available all day for cocktails'.

wine_cellar.description: Whether the venue has a wine cellar.

vendor_rules.description: Rules and flexibility around external vendors and suppliers.

vendor_freedom.description: Overall vendor policy: 'full_freedom' = couples choose any vendor, 'recommended_list' = preferred suppliers available, 'restricted' = must use specific vendors for some categories, 'in_house_only' = all services provided by venue.

preferred_vendor_list_available.description: Whether the venue provides a recommended suppliers list.

vendor_categories_recommended.description: Types of vendors the venue can recommend. E.g. ['caterers', 'photographers', 'DJs', 'florists', 'wedding planners', 'makeup artists'].

in_house_services.description: Services provided in-house by the venue. E.g. ['catering', 'wedding planning', 'photography', 'florals'].

wedding_planner_available.description: Whether wedding planning services are available: 'in_house' = venue has own planner, 'recommended' = they suggest external planners, 'included_in_price' = complimentary coordination included.

wedding_planner_mandatory.description: Whether hiring a wedding planner is mandatory (not just recommended). Common at luxury venues and large estates.

wedding_planner_name.description: Name of the in-house or principal wedding planner. E.g. 'Cynthia Nicholson'.

non_approved_vendor_fee.description: Fee or surcharge for using vendors not on the venue's approved list. E.g. '15% surcharge on caterer invoice', '100 EUR site visit fee for non-listed providers'.

day_of_coordinator_provided.description: Whether a day-of coordinator is provided by the venue.

dedicated_project_manager.description: Whether a dedicated project manager is assigned to each event.

ceremony_types.description: Types of ceremonies the venue can host. E.g. ['secular', 'symbolic', 'religious', 'civil', 'jewish', 'catholic', 'protestant']. Use lowercase.

licensed_for_civil_marriage.description: Whether the venue is legally licensed for civil marriages.

chapel_on_site.description: Whether there is an on-site chapel or church.

chapel_details.description: Details about the on-site chapel. E.g. 'Consecrated chapel seating 30, restored with original paintings and altar'.

nearby_church.description: Details about nearby churches for religious ceremonies. E.g. '18th century church directly opposite, few minutes walk'.

outdoor_ceremony_locations.description: Named outdoor ceremony spots. E.g. ['rose garden', 'avenue of plane trees', 'Southern Terrace', 'Dome Gazebo'].

rain_backup_plan.description: Indoor backup option for outdoor ceremonies. E.g. 'Orangery with adjacent garden', 'Salon d Ete'.

celebrant_available.description: Whether a celebrant/officiant is available or can be recommended.

elopement_option.description: Whether the venue supports elopements or micro-weddings.

amenities.description: On-site facilities and amenities available to guests.

swimming_pool.description: Whether a swimming pool exists on-site.

pool_details.description: Pool specifics — dimensions, heated/unheated, type (saltwater, vitality, natural spring). E.g. '2 heated pools', '12x6m saltwater pool'.

hot_tub_jacuzzi.description: Whether a hot tub or jacuzzi exists.

spa_details.description: Spa specifics. E.g. 'Spa THEMAE with massage room, sauna, steam room', '90m2 spa with swim spa, salt stone sauna, jacuzzi'.

tennis_court.description: Whether a tennis court is available.

gym_fitness.description: Whether a gym or fitness room exists.

games_room.description: Whether a games room (billiards, foosball, etc.) exists.

cinema_room.description: Whether a cinema or screening room exists.

grand_piano.description: Whether a grand piano is available.

children_playground.description: Whether a children's play area exists.

helipad.description: Whether a helicopter landing pad is available.

gardens_description.description: Description of gardens and grounds. E.g. 'French parterre gardens, 5 hectares of parkland with centuries-old plane trees'.

garden_style.description: Style of gardens. E.g. 'French formal', 'English landscape', 'provencal'.

vineyard_on_site.description: Whether an active vineyard is on the property.

olive_groves.description: Whether olive groves are on the estate.

lake_pond.description: Whether a lake, pond, or significant water feature exists on the property.

forest_woodland.description: Whether private forest or woodland is on the property.

notable_trees.description: Significant or historic trees on the property. E.g. ['260-year-old Lebanese Cedar', '365 olive trees', 'centuries-old plane trees'].

fountain_water_feature.description: Whether fountains, cascades, or ornamental water features exist.

activities.description: Activities and experiences available for wedding guests.

on_site_activities.description: Activities available on the property. E.g. ['swimming', 'petanque', 'wine tasting', 'yoga', 'tennis', 'cycling', 'fishing', 'garden games'].

nearby_activities.description: Activities available near the venue. E.g. ['horse riding', 'canoeing', 'golf', 'hiking', 'boat trips on Canal du Midi'].

wine_tasting_on_site.description: Whether wine tasting experiences are available at the venue.

cooking_workshops.description: Whether cooking classes or culinary workshops can be arranged.

excursions_organized.description: Whether the venue organizes day trips or excursions.

excursion_destinations.description: Named excursion destinations. E.g. ['Saint-Emilion', 'Giverny', 'Bassin d Arcachon'].

fireworks_available.description: Whether fireworks displays can be arranged.

fireworks_details.description: Details about fireworks policy. E.g. 'in-house fireworks expert on staff', 'not permitted due to wooded surroundings', 'pyrotechnic shows with reduced noise system'.

technical.description: Technical infrastructure, AV equipment, and practical facilities.

sound_system_provided.description: Whether a PA/sound system is included.

av_equipment.description: Audio-visual equipment available. E.g. ['video projector', 'screen', 'wireless microphone', 'Bose sound system'].

furniture_provided.description: Whether event furniture (tables, chairs) is provided.

furniture_details.description: Specifics about provided furniture. E.g. 'round tables, Napoleon chairs, standing tables', 'reception furniture for up to 100 guests'.

decoration_services.description: Whether the venue offers decoration or lighting design services.

marquee_tent_available.description: Whether an on-site marquee or tent is available.

marquee_size_sqm.description: Size of the on-site marquee in square metres.

backup_generator.description: Whether a backup power generator exists.

ev_charging_stations.description: Whether electric vehicle charging points are available.

climate_control.description: Description of heating/cooling capabilities for event spaces. E.g. 'air-conditioned Grand Gallery', 'radiant heating ceiling', 'underfloor heating/cooling'.

wheelchair_accessible.description: Whether the venue is wheelchair/PMR accessible.

accessible_rooms_count.description: Number of rooms specifically designed for reduced mobility.

accessibility_details.description: Additional accessibility information. E.g. 'Full PMR accessibility throughout', '5 PMR parking spaces near gala hall'.

eco_practices.description: Specific sustainability initiatives. E.g. ['100% solar energy', 'local sourcing', 'beehives on site', 'organic gardens', 'EV charging stations'].

parking_spaces.description: Number of parking spaces if stated.

parking_type.description: Type of parking. E.g. 'free private parking', 'behind the chateau', 'multiple named areas'.

vendor_parking_separate.description: Whether vendors have a dedicated parking area separate from guests.

policies.description: Venue rules, restrictions, and general policies.

curfew_time.description: Latest time for music/events as a general statement. E.g. '4:00 AM', '2:00 AM', 'no curfew'. If indoor and outdoor differ, state both here and use the split fields below.

outdoor_music_curfew.description: Latest time for outdoor music specifically, if different from indoor. E.g. 'midnight', '11:00 PM'.

indoor_music_curfew.description: Latest time for indoor music specifically, if different from outdoor. E.g. '3:00 AM', '4:00 AM', 'no limit'.

no_curfew.description: Whether there is explicitly no curfew.

noise_restrictions.description: Any sound or noise policies. E.g. 'indoor dancing only from 11:30 PM', 'outdoor music until 1am, no curfew indoors'.

setup_access_time.description: When setup and decoration access begins. E.g. 'day before from 2PM', 'Friday 8AM', '6AM on wedding day'.

teardown_deadline.description: Deadline for dismantling and clearing. E.g. 'Sunday 6PM', '6AM morning after', 'by checkout time'.

tent_marquee_policy.description: Rules about tents and marquees. E.g. 'mandatory for groups over 200', 'no tents allowed in garden', 'marquee required in summer', 'all lawn installations must be pre-approved'.

confetti_policy.description: Rules about confetti. E.g. 'prohibited', 'biodegradable only', 'natural petals and lavender only', 'allowed'.

candle_policy.description: Rules about candles. E.g. 'wax candles forbidden', 'must be in holders and extinguished after dinner', 'LED candles only'.

event_insurance_required.description: Whether the venue requires couples to hold event liability or cancellation insurance.

event_insurance_cost_eur.description: Cost of mandatory event insurance if the venue provides/arranges it. E.g. 100, 150.

portable_toilets_policy.description: Rules about portable toilet rental. E.g. 'mandatory for over 90 guests', 'required for outdoor events', 'included'.

lifeguard_required.description: Whether a lifeguard is required for pool access during events.

babysitter_mandatory.description: Whether hiring a babysitter is mandatory when children are present, not just available. E.g. some venues require 1 babysitter per 5 children under 10.

child_friendly.description: Whether the venue is explicitly child-friendly.

baby_facilities.description: Baby amenities available. E.g. ['cots', 'changing facilities', 'high chairs'].

children_area.description: Whether a dedicated children's area or supervised space is available during events.

lgbtq_friendly.description: Whether the venue is explicitly LGBTQ+ friendly.

all_faiths_welcome.description: Whether the venue explicitly welcomes all faiths and religions.

security_guard_policy.description: Whether security is mandatory, optional, or included. E.g. 'mandatory for events running until 4 AM', 'mandatory above 150 guests', 'available upon request'.

events_per_year_limit.description: Whether the venue limits the number of events per year. E.g. 'only a few exclusive weddings per year', 'one wedding per day'.

check_in_time.description: Earliest arrival/check-in time. E.g. '2pm on check-in day', '10am on wedding day'.

check_out_time.description: Departure/check-out time. E.g. '12 noon', 'Monday at 12:00 PM'.

contact.description: Contact information for inquiries and bookings.

phone_primary.description: Main phone number in international format. E.g. '+33 4 90 02 04 91'.

phone_secondary.description: Additional phone number (mobile, WhatsApp, international office).

other_social_media.description: Other social media platforms (YouTube, LinkedIn, Pinterest, TikTok, Vimeo).

whatsapp.description: WhatsApp contact number or link if available.

contact_person.description: Named contact person for wedding inquiries.

phone_hours.description: Hours when phone lines are staffed. E.g. 'Monday to Saturday, 9am to 5pm'.

virtual_tour_url.description: URL to 360-degree virtual tour if available.

event_types.description: All event types the venue hosts. E.g. ['weddings', 'corporate events', 'seminars', 'birthdays', 'baptisms', 'film shoots', 'product launches']. Use lowercase.

wedding_day_details.description: Specific details about the wedding day experience and flow.

typical_timeline.description: Typical wedding day schedule if described. E.g. 'Ceremony ~5pm, cocktail 6pm, dinner 8pm, party 11pm'.

typical_weekend_flow.description: Multi-day wedding weekend flow. E.g. 'Friday: welcome dinner; Saturday: ceremony, reception, party; Sunday: brunch by the pool'.

multi_day_event.description: Whether multi-day wedding celebrations are supported.

cultural_ceremony_experience.description: Specific cultural or religious wedding traditions the venue has experience with. E.g. ['Jewish', 'Hindu', 'Chinese', 'same-sex'].

destination_wedding_speciality.description: Whether the venue specializes in international destination weddings.

street.description: Street address or lieu-dit. E.g. '1850 Route de Cordes', 'Lieu dit La Rode'.

named_distance.description: A named place with its distance or travel time from the venue.

name.description: Name of the place. E.g. 'Marseille Airport', 'Avignon TGV station'.

distance_text.description: Distance or travel time as stated in the source. E.g. '35 minutes', '80 km', '1 hour by car'. Keep the original phrasing.

event_space.description: A named event space at the venue.

name.description: Name of the space. E.g. 'Grand Salon', 'Cour d Honneur', 'Southern Terrace'.

setting.description: Whether the space is indoor, outdoor, or covered outdoor (e.g. terrace with roof, courtyard with retractable cover).

capacity_ceremony.description: Maximum ceremony capacity if different from seated.

rental_fee_eur.description: Separate rental fee for this space in EUR if priced individually. E.g. 1000 for the Chai add-on, 700 for full-day Taproom hire.

suitable_for.description: What the space can be used for. E.g. ['ceremony', 'cocktail', 'dinner', 'dancing', 'brunch', 'rain_backup'].

notable_features.description: Architectural or design highlights of this space. E.g. ['glass ceiling by Joseph Paxton', 'crystal chandeliers', 'exposed stone walls'].

description.description: Prose description of the space's character.

soundproofed.description: Whether this specific space is soundproofed.

air_conditioned.description: Whether this space has air conditioning.

av_equipment.description: AV equipment specific to this space. E.g. ['overhead projector', 'Bose sound system'].

accommodation_building.description: A separate accommodation building on the estate (chateau, gite, cottage, annexe).

name.description: Name of the building. E.g. 'Le Chateau', 'La Chapelle', 'Gite de l Abbe', 'Maison des Fleurs'.

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in this building.

sleeping_capacity.description: Maximum number of guests who can sleep in this building.

price_per_night_eur.description: Nightly rate for the entire building in EUR if quoted at building level. E.g. 2100 for the whole castle, 475 for a gite.

has_kitchen.description: Whether this building has its own kitchen (relevant for gites).

has_living_area.description: Whether this building has a separate living/dining area.

has_private_garden.description: Whether this building has its own private garden or terrace.

rooms.description: Individual rooms within this building if detailed.

name.description: Name of the room. E.g. 'La Chambre Tosca', 'The Empress Suite', 'Room Iode'.

capacity_persons.description: Maximum number of persons this room accommodates.

bed_configuration.description: Bed types and sizes. E.g. '1 King bed (180x200)', '1 Double + 2 Singles', 'King bed + sofa bed'.

en_suite.description: Whether the room has a private en-suite bathroom.

bathroom_type.description: Type of bathroom facilities. E.g. 'en-suite shower', 'en-suite bath and shower', 'shared bathroom on corridor', 'private bathroom across hall'.

view.description: View from the room. E.g. 'Garden view', 'Vineyard view', 'Pool view'.

has_terrace.description: Whether the room has a private terrace or balcony.

air_conditioned.description: Whether this room has air conditioning.

accessible.description: Whether this room is designed for reduced mobility/wheelchair access.

price_per_night_eur.description: Nightly rate in EUR if quoted individually.

seasonal_price.description: A pricing tier for a specific season and/or day-of-week combination.

months.description: Which months this season covers. E.g. 'June to September', 'November to March'.

day_of_week.description: Day-of-week qualifier if pricing differs between weekday and weekend within the same season. E.g. 'weekend', 'weekday', 'friday', 'saturday', 'sunday'. Null if no day-of-week distinction.

price_eur.description: Venue hire price for this season/day combination in EUR.

price_description.description: What the price covers. E.g. '2 days / 1 night', 'full weekend Friday to Monday'.

pricing_package.description: A named pricing package offered by the venue.

price_eur.description: Starting price for this package in EUR.

price_per_person_eur.description: Per-person price if the package is quoted per head.

min_guests.description: Minimum number of guests for this package.

max_guests.description: Maximum number of guests for this package.

includes.description: Detailed list of what is included. E.g. ['4-course menu', '3 glasses of wine', 'brut champagne', 'DJ for 4 hours', 'bridal bouquet'].

excludes.description: Items explicitly excluded from this package. E.g. ['chateau access', 'pool area', 'decoration'].

seasonal_validity.description: When this package is available. E.g. '1st October to 30th May & weekdays'.

tiered_pricing.description: Price tiers that scale by guest count.

payment_milestone.description: A single payment stage in a multi-instalment payment schedule.

stage.description: Name or description of this payment stage. E.g. 'deposit', '2nd instalment', 'final balance'.

percentage.description: Percentage of total due at this stage. E.g. 30, 35, 40.

amount_eur.description: Fixed EUR amount due at this stage if not expressed as a percentage.

timing.description: When this payment is due. E.g. 'at booking', '6 months before', '8 days before event', '30 days before'.
